coreNumbers.title: Numeri fondamentali
coreNumbers.lifePathDesc: Il tuo scopo di vita e il percorso che cammini
coreNumbers.expressionDesc: Le tue abilità e talenti naturali
coreNumbers.soulUrgeDesc: Le tue motivazioni e desideri interiori
coreNumbers.birthdayDesc: I tuoi doni e talenti naturali

astrology.title: Astrologia
astrology.subtitle: La luce dietro la tua vita

planets.title: Pianeti
planets.subtitle: La tua firma planetaria unica
planets.sunDesc: Il tuo senso centrale di sé e vitalità.
planets.moonDesc: Il tuo paesaggio emotivo e mondo interiore.
planets.marsDesc: La tua spinta, desiderio e come agisci.
planets.saturnDesc: Le tue lezioni e aree di padronanza.
planets.neptuneDesc: I tuoi sogni, intuizione e natura spirituale.
planets.plutoDesc: Le tue profondità e potere trasformativo.
planets.northNodeDesc: Il tuo invito verso la crescita.
planets.deepDiveTitle: What Your Planets Mean For You
planets.description: These show how different parts of you express themselves—your drive, your communication style, how you love and relate.
planets.chironDesc: Where healing emerges from your deepest wounds.

houses.title: Case
houses.subtitle: Le 12 aree di vita della tua carta
houses.secondDesc: La tua relazione con risorse, valore e stabilità.
houses.fourthDesc: La tua fondazione interiore, casa e radici emotive.
houses.sixthDesc: I tuoi ritmi quotidiani, lavoro e benessere.
houses.ninthDesc: La tua ricerca di significato, fede ed espansione.
houses.tenthDesc: Il tuo ruolo pubblico, carriera e eredità visibile.
houses.eleventhDesc: La tua visione per comunità, amicizia e il futuro.
houses.twelfthDesc: Il tuo santuario interiore, solitudine e il sacro.
houses.deepDiveTitle: What Your Houses Mean For You
houses.description: Houses show where life themes unfold—which arenas of life ask the most of you, and where certain energies come alive.
houses.firstDesc: How you meet the world and present yourself.
houses.thirdDesc: How you communicate, learn, and connect nearby.
houses.fifthDesc: Where you create, play, and express joy.
houses.seventhDesc: How you partner, reflect, and relate one-to-one.
houses.eighthDesc: Where you merge, transform, and face the unknown.

aspects.title: Aspetti
aspects.subtitle: Le conversazioni tra i tuoi pianeti
aspects.deepDiveTitle: What Your Aspects Mean For You
aspects.description: Aspects show how different inner parts of you interact—where they support, challenge, or intensify each other.

patterns.title: Schemi e percorso
patterns.aboveDesc: La tua carta è orientata verso la visibilità e l'espressione esterna. La vita spesso ti chiede di mostrarti, essere visto e interagire con il mondo esterno.
patterns.belowDesc: La tua carta è orientata verso la riflessione interiore e la sottigliezza. La vita spesso si sviluppa attraverso l'elaborazione interiore, l'osservazione tranquilla e il lavoro dietro le quinte.
patterns.deepDiveTitle: What Your Patterns Mean For You
patterns.subtitle: Major configurations in your chart
patterns.description: Patterns are large-scale energetic shapes in your chart—where several planets connect to form a recognizable theme or recurring dynamic.
patterns.noPatterns: No major patterns detected in your chart.
patterns.tSquareDesc: A T-Square creates tension between three areas of life, asking you to find creative solutions. It often feels like productive friction—pressure that pushes you toward growth, innovation, and resilience. This pattern tends to keep you moving forward, even when stillness might feel easier.
patterns.grandTrineDesc: A Grand Trine forms a triangle of ease and flow, where energy moves smoothly between three areas. This can feel like natural talent or effortless grace. The invitation is to activate this gift consciously rather than letting it remain passive—talent unused doesn't always become mastery.

errors.birthDetailsRequiredMessage: Abbiamo bisogno dei tuoi dettagli di nascita completi per calcolare la tua carta.
errors.signInRequired: Please sign in to view your Soul Path.
errors.incompleteProfileDesc: We need your full birth date, time, and location in Settings before Solara can generate your Soul Path.

narrative.title: Your Personal Narrative
narrative.subtitle: Your cosmic story and life themes
narrative.notAvailableDesc: We calculated your Soul Path, but couldn't generate a full interpretation right now. Your placements are saved — please try again in a moment.

energyShape.title: Energy Shape
energyShape.deepDiveTitle: What Your Energy Shape Means For You
energyShape.subtitle: Element and modality balance
energyShape.description: This shows how energy moves through you—the underlying rhythm of your chart and where certain qualities concentrate or disperse.
energyShape.dayChartDesc: Your chart is oriented toward visibility and outward expression. Life often asks you to show up, be seen, and engage with the external world.
energyShape.nightChartDesc: Your chart is oriented toward inner reflection and subtlety. Life often unfolds through inner processing, quiet observation, and behind-the-scenes work.
energyShape.chartRulerDesc: This planet guides the overall direction of your life and filters how you engage with the world.
energyShape.dominantPlanetsDesc: These planets shape your experience most strongly—they appear in multiple key positions or form important connections.
energyShape.dominantSignsDesc: These signs color how you move through the world. Their qualities show up repeatedly in how you express yourself.
energyShape.elementModalityDesc: Elements show where your energy naturally gathers—whether in inspiration (fire), grounding (earth), thought (air), or emotion (water). Modalities reflect how you engage—whether you initiate (cardinal), stabilize (fixed), or adapt (mutable).

intensityZones.title: Intensity Zones
intensityZones.deepDiveTitle: What Your Intensity Zones Mean For You
intensityZones.subtitle: Where energy clusters in your chart
intensityZones.description: This shows where life feels concentrated—where multiple planets gather, creating areas of heightened focus and recurring themes.
intensityZones.signEmphasisDesc: Multiple planets in these signs amplify their qualities—you might notice these themes appearing repeatedly in how you think, feel, and respond.
intensityZones.houseEmphasisDesc: These life areas ask a lot of you—they're where complexity, growth, and attention naturally gather.
intensityZones.stelliumDesc: A stellium here creates a concentrated beam of attention—multiple inner parts converging on one theme. This area tends to feel vivid, complex, and central to your experience.

direction.title: Direction
direction.deepDiveTitle: What Your Direction Means For You
direction.subtitle: North Node, South Node, and life path
direction.description: This reflects growth, healing, and familiarity—where you're invited to stretch, where you naturally return, and where old wounds become sources of wisdom.
direction.northNodeDesc: Your North Node is an invitation toward growth and unfamiliar territory. It points to qualities you're developing, even when they don't feel natural yet. This is where life asks you to stretch—not because you lack something, but because expansion lives here.
direction.southNodeDesc: Your South Node represents familiar patterns and natural comfort. These are qualities you carry easily, perhaps from early life or past experience. The South Node isn't something to abandon, but rather a foundation to honor while you reach toward the North Node's invitation.
direction.chironDesc: Chiron shows where healing and teaching emerge from your deepest wounds. What once hurt can become a source of compassion and guidance for others. Chiron doesn't promise that the wound disappears, but that it becomes medicine.

joy.title: Part of Fortune
joy.description: This reflects ease, joy, and natural alignment—where life feels generous and where you access flow without force.
joy.meaning: The Part of Fortune shows where natural joy and ease flow most readily in your life. This isn't about achievement or effort—it's where things align organically, where you feel instinctively at home.

connections.title: Connessioni
connections.subtitle: Mappa le persone nella tua orbita ed esplora insight relazionali
connections.noConnections: Ancora nessuna connessione. Aggiungi qualcuno per iniziare a esplorare insight relazionali.
connections.noConnectionsMessage: Aggiungi la tua prima connessione per esplorare le dinamiche della tua relazione.
connections.notesPlaceholder: Annota pensieri, schemi o cose che vuoi ricordare su questa connessione...

spaceBetween.title: Lo Spazio Tra
spaceBetween.subtitle: Il tuo progetto di relazione con {connectionName}
spaceBetween.generating: Generazione del tuo progetto di relazione...
spaceBetween.discoverDescription: Genera il tuo progetto di relazione permanente con {connectionName}. Questo insight profondo viene creato una volta e salvato per sempre.

location.title: Aiuta Solara a sincronizzare il tuo cielo
location.body:
Per generare i tuoi approfondimenti all'inizio della tua giornata, Solara ha bisogno di sapere approssimativamente dove ti trovi nel mondo.

Usiamo questo solo per calcolare il tuo fuso orario in modo che la tua guida giornaliera, settimanale e mensile si aggiorni all'ora locale corretta.

Se salti questo passaggio, useremo UTC come predefinito. Solara funzionerà comunque, ma il tuo tempismo potrebbe sembrare un po' sfasato.

errors.rateLimited: Troppe richieste. Per favore riprova più tardi.
errors.sessionExpired: La tua sessione è scaduta. Per favore accedi di nuovo.

deletion.noCode: Nessun codice di conferma fornito. Utilizza il link dalla tua email di conferma eliminazione dati.
deletion.notFound: Richiesta di eliminazione non trovata. Il codice di conferma potrebbe essere non valido o scaduto.

pending.title: In Attesa
pending.description: La tua richiesta di eliminazione dati e stata ricevuta ed e in attesa di elaborazione.

processing.title: In Elaborazione
processing.description: I tuoi dati sono attualmente in fase di eliminazione dai nostri sistemi.

completed.title: Completata
completed.description: I tuoi dati sono stati eliminati con successo da Solara Insights.
completed.permanentNotice: Tutti i tuoi dati personali associati al tuo account Facebook sono stati eliminati permanentemente da Solara Insights. Questa azione non puo essere annullata.

failed.title: Fallita
failed.description: Si e verificato un problema nell'elaborazione della richiesta di eliminazione. Contatta l'assistenza.

userNotFound.title: Nessun Dato Trovato
userNotFound.description: Nessun account trovato associato al tuo account Facebook. Nessun dato da eliminare.
